00017 class randoom

00019   const gsl_rng_type * T;
00020   gsl_rng * r;
00021         public:
00022         
00023         randoom(int type,unsigned long seed)
00024         {
00025           gsl_rng_env_setup();
00026           switch (type)
00027           {
00028                 case 0 :  T = gsl_rng_taus; break;
00029                 case 1 : T = gsl_rng_mt19937;break;
00030                 case 2 : T = gsl_rng_ranlux389;break;
00031                 case 3 : T = gsl_rng_cmrg;break;
00032                 default : T =gsl_rng_taus;break;
00033           }
00034           r = gsl_rng_alloc (T);
00035           gsl_rng_set(r,seed*time(0));
00036         }
00037 
00038         double generate()
00039         {       
00040         
00041                 double u = gsl_rng_uniform (r);
00042                 return (u);
00043         }
00044 
00045         ~randoom()
00046         {
00047           gsl_rng_free (r);
00048         }
